original_text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body.
korean_text: 우리가 항상 예수의 죽음을 몸에 짊어짐은 예수의 생명이 또한 우리 몸에 나타나게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Always bearing about in the body
the dying of the Lord Jesus
that the life also of Jesus
might be made manifest in our body
